events.message: The insured reported a car collision that occurred on the morning of April 30th involving their vehicle and another driver.
The case was reviewed by the insurance team and categorized as an Auto Accident claim due to vehicle damage.
Agent Smith was assigned to manage the claim and serve as the primary contact for the insured.
The insured was sent an acknowledgment confirming receipt of the accident claim and next steps.
The claims team requested a police report, vehicle repair estimates, and photos of the accident scene.
The insured uploaded all requested documentation including the police report and garage damage assessment.
An investigation was commenced to verify claim details and assess liability based on submitted evidence.
Investigation concluded confirming fault of the third party and validating the insured’s reported damages.
The insurance company proposed a settlement amount covering the full cost of vehicle repair and related expenses.
The insured expressed satisfaction with the prompt processing and clarity of the settlement proposal.
After reviewing all terms, the claim was officially approved to proceed with payment issuance.
The full settlement amount was deposited into the insured’s registered bank account successfully.
The claim was closed following successful payment and confirmation of vehicle repairs completion.
All records and documentation related to this auto accident claim were archived for future reference.
